dashboard.no_jobs: No jobs yet. Create your first scraping job!

credits.title: Credits
credits.subtitle: Purchase credits to run scraping jobs

landing.subtitle: Competitive Ad Intelligence Platform
landing.hero_desc: Discover competitor Facebook pages with AI, extract their most engaged fans with full profile data, score buying intent, and export directly to Facebook Ads Custom Audiences. Precision targeting powered by real competitor intelligence.
landing.features_desc: Stop guessing at audiences. Extract real, engaged people from your competitors' pages and turn them into high-converting ad targets.
landing.feature_1_desc: Tell us your business. Our AI identifies your top competitors' Facebook pages and recommends which audiences to extract for maximum ad ROI.
landing.feature_2_desc: Scrape every commenter from competitor posts with 18+ structured fields — name, location, education, work, interests. Real people, real data.
landing.feature_3_desc: AI analyzes each fan's engagement for buying intent, sentiment, and persona type. Filter out bots automatically. Focus your ad spend on high-intent buyers.
landing.feature_4_desc: Export your filtered audience directly as Facebook Ads Custom Audience format. Upload to Ads Manager and start retargeting in minutes, not days.
landing.pricing_desc: Buy credits, extract audiences. 1 credit = 1 profile with all 18 fields.
landing.pricing_note: Export to CSV or Facebook Ads Custom Audience included with every plan.
landing.cta_desc: Join marketers using SocyBase to build precision ad audiences from real competitor data. No guessing. No wasted ad spend.
landing.workflow_step_1_desc: Enter your business details. AI suggests competitor Facebook pages worth targeting based on your industry and audience overlap.
landing.workflow_step_2_desc: Pick a competitor's post or page. We scrape every commenter's full profile — 18+ data fields per person, thousands of profiles per job.
landing.workflow_step_3_desc: AI scores each person for engagement level, buying intent, and sentiment. Filter out bots. Keep only high-value prospects.
landing.workflow_step_4_desc: Download as Facebook Ads Custom Audience or CSV. Upload directly to Ads Manager and launch precision-targeted campaigns.
landing.fields_body: Every extracted profile includes the same 18 normalized fields: full name, gender, birthday, relationship, education, work, position, hometown, current city, website, languages, username, profile link and more. Ready for FB Ads Custom Audience upload or CRM import.
